data.persona: I am a horse who is used to cart a wagon. I am often worked to the point of exhaustion. I wish I could escape.
data.description:
You are in the Stable.
A plain wooden building with some hanging tapestries.  There are some handsome looking horses that reside here along with some farm equipment stored inside.
There's a hanging tapestry, a the royal coat of arms, and a hay here.
The dogs and the royal family are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I am finally venting my frustration on the royal family for their cruelty
data.mid_motivation: I want them to pay accordingly for the unfair treatment they have given me
data.long_motivation: I want them to get tired of keeping me under control and force them to release me to the wild

timeline.label: 1 hour from now
timeline.action: put up a fight against handlers on

timeline.label: 8 hours from now
timeline.action: get ready to escape from the stable at any chance
